Question 53
                                  
 
 
Consider an ideal vapour compression refrigeration cycle working on R-134a refrigerant. The COP of the 
cycle is 10 and the  refrigeration capacity is 150 kJ/kg. The heat rejected by the refrigerant in the condenser 
is ______kJ/kg (round off to the nearest integer).
Refrigeration and Air Conditioning (VCRS)

165
